sgcool_label_text:The Singapore Changi Airport Magazine provides a guide to tourists on the various sightseeing landmarks in Singapore. Published in August 1990
 this particular edition commemorates Singapore’s Silver Jubilee as an independent nation. \r\n\r\nThis magazine features an article on how Singapore has become an international business centre and air hub
 while retaining its historic charm. It sheds light on the various redevelopment projects in the Civic and Cultural District during that period
 such as the restoration of the 19th century Empress Place Building and Raffles Hotel
 which is featured on the magazine’s cover page. The Singapore Changi Airport Magazine provides a guide to tourists on the various sightseeing landmarks in Singapore. Published in August 1990
 this particular edition commemorates Singapore’s Silver Jubilee as an independent nation. \r\n\r\nThis magazine features an article on how Singapore has become an international business centre and air hub
 while retaining its historic charm. It sheds light on the various redevelopment projects in the Civic and Cultural District during that period
 such as the restoration of the 19th century Empress Place Building and Raffles Hotel
 which is featured on the magazine’s cover page.

metadata.sgcool_label_text:
The Singapore Changi Airport Magazine provides a guide to tourists on the various sightseeing landmarks in Singapore. Published in August 1990, this particular edition commemorates Singapore’s Silver Jubilee as an independent nation. 

This magazine features an article on how Singapore has become an international business centre and air hub, while retaining its historic charm. It sheds light on the various redevelopment projects in the Civic and Cultural District during that period, such as the restoration of the 19th century Empress Place Building and Raffles Hotel, which is featured on the magazine’s cover page.
